title.en: Neon Bloom: The Circuitry of Life

description.ko: 유기적인 아름다움과 기술적 진보의 교차점을 탐구하며, 자연이 빛과 데이터의 디지털 걸작으로 진화하는 모습을 시각화했습니다.
description.en: A breathtaking exploration of the intersection between organic beauty and technological advancement, where nature evolves into a digital masterpiece of light and data.

prompt: Macro shot of a translucent crystalline flower with glowing fiber-optic stamens. Digital circuit patterns etched onto the petals. Neon pulses running through the stems like sap. Soft bokeh background with floating data fragments and pixelated pollen. Hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, cyberpunk digital nature aesthetic.
